environment_variables.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi)
environment_variables.SPACK_SPEC: py-h5py@3.4.0 % gcc@8.5.0 ~mpi ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^hdf5@1.10.7/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' hdf5@1.10.7 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi)
